Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie & #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/63rd Street
ShortDescription: SB 52 Kedzie & 52A South Kedzie buses are temp. rerouted via Kedzie, 63rd, California, Marquette, & Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/63rd Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie & #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 63rd, California, Marquette, & Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/63rd Street.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Lake Shore Dr./Michigan Exit
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan  buses temp. rerouted SB Stockton, LaSalle, Ohio and Michigan;  NB Michigan, Ontario, LaSalle and Stockton near Lake Shore Dr./Michigan Exit.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake Shore Drive/Michigan Exit, due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Michigan Exit.

Southbound buses will operate via Stockton, LaSalle, Ohio, and Michigan including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, LaSalle and Stockton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #134 Stockton/LaSalle Express Temporary Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/Michigan Exit
ShortDescription: 134 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Ontario, LaSalle and Lake Shore Dr. SB Lake Shore Dr., LaSalle, Ohio and Michigan: near Lake Shore Dr./Michigan Exit.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#134 Stockton/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake Shore Drive/Michigan Exit due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Michigan Exit.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, LaSalle and Lake Shore Drive including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Ohio and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 135 buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Ontario, LaSalle and Lake Shore Dr; SB Lake Shore Dr., LaSalle, Ohio and Michigan near Lake Shore Dr./Michigan Exit.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake Shore Drive/Michigan Exit due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Michigan Exit.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, LaSalle and Lake Shore Drive including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound  buses will operate via Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Ohio and Michigan.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Navy Pier
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted EB: Chicago Ave, Fairbanks, Ontario, and into terminal; WB: Fairbanks, & Chicago Ave,  due to, street blockage near Navy Pier.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Navy Pier, due to street blockage near Navy Pier.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago Avenue, Fairbanks, Ontario, and into the terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via Fairbanks, & Chicago Avenue.

Allow extra travel time
